attributes.action: Stop fruit and vegetables being sold in supermarkets packed in plastic trays and covered in cellophane!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know and have done so for years that plastic carrier bags are ruining our environment! The same can be said for all this packaging! Bring nback brown paper bags! We need to pick up our fruit#veg take it to the checkout and pay. NO MORE PLASTIC PACKAGING. The food will be cheaper, no need for machines to pack it and it will be untarnished. Do not charge us for the paper bags, they are kind to the environment,keep veg fresh and will be a good will gift for the consumers from the supermarket chiefs!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
